citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00-11:30am EST
on 9/23/24. The inspector attempted to contact licensee by knocking on the door and the licensee's father answered but
had to leave. I called the licensee and left a message. He returned the call, but after I left, and he couldn't return within
one hour. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA
and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00-11:30am EST 
on 9/23/24. The inspector attempted to contact licensee by knocking on the door and the licensee's father answered but 
had to leave. I called the licensee and left a message. He returned the call, but after I left, and he couldn't return within 
one hour. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA 
and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
